general_advisory: Farmers are advised to grow short duration Rabi crops like green gram, black gram, cowpea, field pea, lentil, groundnut, toria, and sunflower in medium/shallow lowlands utilizing the available soil moisture in the field. Farmers are advised to visit their crop fields regularly to check pest infestation.

To manage wilt and rot disease, drench the root zone with a solution of 10g Plantomycin mixed in 10 litres of water.

To manage wilt and rot disease, drench the root zone with a solution of 10g Plantomycin mixed in 10 litres of water.
To manage wilt and rot disease, drench the root zone with a solution of 10g Plantomycin mixed in 10 litres of water.
Internode borer management - Use Trichogramma chilonis card @ 1/acre at weekly intervals.
To manage the pest chemically, spray Fipronil @ 600 ml/acre or Chlorantraniliprole 0.4 GR @ 4 kg/acre.
Also apply Chlorantraniliprole 0.4 GR @ 4kg/acre by mixing with 8 kg of sand.
To manage fruit fly in cucurbits, prepare a poison bait.
Fertilizer Management - Apply urea and MOP per acre.
Spraying of Boron micronutrient should be done after transplanting and before curd formation.
To manage Red Spider Mites, spray wettable sulphur or Fenpyroximate.
To manage Red Spider Mites, spray wettable sulphur or Fenpyroximate.
